function.name: str_replace_editor

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/matplotlib/lib/matplotlib/_c_internal_utils.py
+++ /workspace/matplotlib/lib/matplotlib/_c_internal_utils.py
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+"""Python fallback for the compiled _c_internal_utils extension.
@@ -1,0 +3,41 @@
+This module provides a small subset of the functions expected by the
+pure-Python parts of matplotlib for environments where the compiled
+extension is not available (e.g., during tests in this kata).
+"""
+import os
+
+
+def display_is_valid():
+    """Return whether a display is available.
+
+    On Linux, we consider a display valid if either $DISPLAY or
+    $WAYLAND_DISPLAY is set. On other platforms, assume True.
+    """
+    if os.name == "posix":
+        if os.environ.get("DISPLAY"):
+            return True
+        if os.environ.get("WAYLAND_DISPLAY"):
+            return True
+        return False
+    return True
+
+
+def Win32_GetCurrentProcessExplicitAppUserModelID():
+    return None
+
+
+def Win32_SetCurrentProcessExplicitAppUserModelID(arg):
+    return None
+
+
+def Win32_GetForegroundWindow():
+    return None
+
+
+def Win32_SetForegroundWindow(arg):
+    return None
+
+
+def Win32_SetProcessDpiAwareness_max():
+    return None
+
